Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2018 09:16AM BeccaFish wrote: I was stage 1, triple positive, no lymph node involvement. I had the 4 A/C treatments, the 12 Taxol, 4 Perjeta and 1 year on Herceptin, and am now on Arimidex (I was only 39 at diagnosis, but I was put into a medically induced menopause to protect my eggs so that I can try to have children in a couple of years and then return to the Arimidex after, so my MO thought Arimidex was a better option than Tamoxifen.). I had a double mastectomy even though I only had one small tumor in one breast and wanted to be as aggressive as possible with treatment because I want to do everything I possibly can’t to avoid a reoccurrence.
Posts.Title: Triple Positive Breast Cancer marionkluges marionkluges
